page.title: 02Torphichen Primary School
page.content: Torphichen Primary School is very small with a total number of 58 pupils.It has 3 teachers but has various visiting teachers for art, music, craft, gym, swimming and a remedial teacher.The school takes part in sporting events such as cross country running, badminton, netball, football, rounders, and of course swimming. The pupils watch TV programmes which cover many interesting subjects. As part of their education some pupils spend time at camps in Dunkeld, Aberfoyle, Belmont and Edinburgh. This year, 1985, the pupils got an opportunity to go to London. Everyone who went enjoyed it and the highlight of the visit was Andrew Lloyd Webber's Musical "Cats."
